attributes.action: ban the music software plugin known as "Autotune"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This "plugin" for computer based music production has saturated the musical arena and is dividing public opinion. 

To ensure that this does not escalate, destroying the mainstream and independant musical scenes, We petition the Prime Minsiter to ban sale, use or distibution of this plugin.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
